reviews.author: Katie Blackwell
reviews.review: Wow. I have to say I'm taken aback. I missed a viewing when I regretfully entered it into my calander wrong. I called back to apologize and reschedule and was shamed by the woman who answered. Completely unnecessary. I'll be taking my

reviews.author: Whitney Eichler
reviews.review: My husband and I called on a house to rent. The first thing she asked was if we had good credit. I have great credit but my husband doesn't due a divorce and custody battle.  As soon as I mentioned that she immediately snubbed us.

reviews.author: tjseren
reviews.review: My experience was at the lake what com blvd office, NOT the lake way office.....
